text: For the first time ever  I m genuinely considering suicide That s basically all there is to it  I ve been depressed for basically the last ten years of my life  Teenage years are hard and that depression was different  I look back now and wonder  why  Why was I depressed when everything was so easy  I had my reasons  But they are minuscule compared to the shit show I live out now  I ve never felt so alone  I ve never felt so distant from the world  I ve never not been afraid to die  But here I am  Suicide was always something that I had in the back of my head  I thought about it  but the best way I could phrase the feeling of  wanting  to commit suicide was just that I didn t want to die  I just wanted things to be different  I needed change  But  that was the me who still had hope  Who still tried to find the light despite the shit around me  But at this point in my life  I m tired  I m worn out  Exhausted  I feel like I might actually be going crazy at times  I m numb  There s a small thread holding me onto this life right now  But it s starting to break too  I m so close to just saying fuck it  Fuck the stress and the anxiety and the sadness  Fuck the bills and the appointments and the   hour work week  Fuck taking care of everyone else  Fuck it all  It never gets better  They lie  They always have and always will  They want us to stay alive to drain us of money  Because that s all this world revolves around  Greed and selfishness  I m so tired of it all  What comes after death no longer scares me  Because even if hell is real  I d rather just burn and feel actual pain than the way I ve felt for so long now  I m tired
summary: For the first time in his life he considers suicide. He has been depressed for the last ten years. He is tired and depressed. He would rather die than live the way he has lived for so long. He thinks the world revolves around Greed and selfishness.
cleaned: time life consider suicide depress year tired depressed die live way live long think world revolve greed selfishness
